title: How to learn to play Crusader Kings II - Quora

response.answer_text: Play as Ireland Duke of only 1 territory. This will teach you fundamentals, without overwhelming you. This will mean the only thing you will initially worry is about your vassals or family, which are few so you will easily be able to follow the events occuring. Also, the Irish are far from many things occuring in the game such as different cultures and so on and forth. Therefore pleanty of time to grow in your own time without being overwhelmed by invasions from a million angles. Then as you play, if you get stuck on something, Google the what your stuck on and follow the video.

By playing it :) Pick a leader od a large and well organizeed country to start, Byzantine emperor or something similar and don't try to expand too much. Focus on maintaining power first, expanding it as second. You'll get a hang of it in 2–10 hours, after which you can try something fancier :)
